entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 24. POP 40%
entry.summary: Sunny then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. High 24. Humidex 25. UV index 9 or very high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Showers at times heavy. Low 7.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Local amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 early this evening then light late this evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Showers. High 13.
entry.summary: Showers. Local amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High 13. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
